participant_1.background:
I spent my last summer riding horses and learning more about music with friends who understand my passion.
i have a pet snake.
I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments.
I cosplay with my husband and enjoy going to Comic Con.
My wedding planning business took off after I had my home featured in a magazine for being the cleanest in the city.

participant_2.background:
I like to make my own art, so I would like to decorate my baby's nursery with handmade wall art.
going to the beach is my favorite past time.
I like taking my dog to the dog park to meet other dogs and play.
i m a really , really good guitar player.
pizza is my most favorite thing.

content.text: Hey there!
Hello! How are you today?
I'm great! Just spent some time at the beach. How about you?
That sounds amazing! I love the beach, but I've been too busy with work lately to go.
Oh I know how that is! I'm actually a wedding planner, so my work life can get pretty hectic.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to be a wedding planner, but I don't think I have the patience for it.
It definitely takes a lot of patience, but it's also really rewarding. I love seeing my clients' faces when they see their dream wedding come to life.
That sounds like an amazing feeling! I'm sure you're really good at your job.
Thank you! I try my best!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to ride horses, learn about music, and go to Comic Con with my husband.
That sounds really fun! I love going to the beach, playing guitar, and taking my dog to the dog park.
Oh I love dogs! I wish I could have one, but I'm not sure I have enough time for one right now.
Yeah, they're definitely a lot of work, but they're so worth it.
I know, I've heard they're the best companions.
They are! I'm so glad I have mine.
Me too! So, what's your favorite pizza topping?
My favorite pizza topping is pepperoni! What's yours?
I love pepperoni too! But I also love pineapple.
Oh no! I hate pineapple on pizza!
Really? I know a lot of people who hate it, but I think it's delicious.
I just can't get over the taste of it.
Well, you're missing out!
I guess so!
Haha, well, I'm glad we could have this conversation about pizza.
Me too! It was fun!
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a nice day!
You too
